===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Dinghai]] [[district|District]] (定海[[區]]) of the [[prefecture]]-[[level]] "[[city]]" of [[Zhoushan]] ([[舟山]][[市]]) in [[Zhejiang]], [[China]], [[cover]]ing the [[western]] [[half]] of [[Zhoushan]] [[island|Island]] and [[some]] of the [[surround]]ing [[island]]s.
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Dinghai]], the [[former]] [[separate]] [[city]] which [[serve]]d as the [[seat]] of the [[Zhoushan]] [[archipelago|Archipelago]]'s [[various]] [[government]]s.
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Dinghai]] [[county|County]] (定海[[縣]]), a [[former]] [[county]] of [[Zhejiang]] [[cover]]ing the [[Zhoushan]] [[archipelago|Archipelago]] under the [[Ming]], [[early]] [[Qing]], [[Republic of China|Republic]], and [[early]] [[People's Republic of China|People's Republic]].
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Dinghai]] [[subprefecture|Subprefecture]] (定海[[直隸廳]]), a [[former]] [[division]] of [[Zhejiang]] [[cover]]ing the [[Zhoushan]] [[archipelago|Archipelago]] under the [[late]] [[Qing]].
